p: Figure 4 illustrates the distribution of cases of influenza in different months throughout the year 2016. It can be seen that higher number of influenza cases were reported two times during the year 2016, firstly during the month of January–February and secondly during the month of July–August. The highest number of cases suspected of having influenza infection and, influenza positive cases both were recorded in the month of August. The data also show that during those months, the number of positive cases were almost half of the total cases registered in that particular months making incidence rate 50%. Rest of the months had positive cases much less than half of the total cases. The least number of influenza positive cases were reported in the months of May, October and November ( Figure 4).
